SEARCH

Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.util

package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.util
Utility classes for the Gumdrop server.

This package provides common utility classes used throughout the Gumdrop codebase, including I/O helpers, SSL utilities, and general-purpose algorithms.

Key Components

  • CIDRNetwork - Represents a CIDR network block for IP address matching
  • SNIKeyManager - SSL KeyManager with Server Name Indication (SNI) support
  • EmptyX509TrustManager - Trust manager that accepts all certificates (for testing)
  • JarInputStream - Extended JAR input stream with additional utilities
  • IteratorEnumeration - Adapter from Iterator to Enumeration
  • LaconicFormatter - Compact log formatter for java.util.logging
  • MessageFormatter - Message formatting utilities

Design Principles

  • No external dependencies
  • Thread-safe where applicable
  • Memory efficient
  • Java 8 compatible

Internal Use

While these utilities are used internally by Gumdrop, they may also be useful for applications built on top of the framework.

Author:
Chris Burdess

    Package
    Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop
    Core framework for the Gumdrop multipurpose Java server.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CIDRNetwork
    Efficient representation of a CIDR network block for fast IP address matching.
    EmptyX509TrustManager
    Empty implementation of an X509 trust manager.
    IteratorEnumeration<T>
    Enumeration wrapper for collection classes.
    JarInputStream
    Wrapper for an input stream returned from a JarFile.getInputStream.
    LaconicFormatter
    A simple logging formatter that prints the minimum of information.
    MessageFormatter
    A simple logging formatter that prints the log message followed by EOL.
    SNIKeyManager
    An X509ExtendedKeyManager that selects certificates based on SNI (Server Name Indication).
    XMLParseUtils
    Utility methods for parsing XML using the Gonzalez streaming parser.
